descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Learn to report and produce visual stories for the web using equipment you already own. This course is geared for students who are not making video their main focus but want to advance their video skill set. The course emphasizes video production basics to accompany and bolster existing reporting skills. You'll become proficient in methodologies for conceiving, creating, assembling, and distributing web-based and social-media-geared video. You'll develop shooting skills while thinking visually, utilizing your phone, DSLR, or camcorder. You'll become comfortable crafting and editing your video using Premiere on your laptop.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Students in Advanced Video may not take this class
